articles.description: Most of the crypto market is having a meh Monday—except for a handful of gaming and metaverse tokens.
articles.title: Bitcoin and Ethereum Have a Meh Monday While Gaming Tokens Score Gains

articles.description: We break down the differences between AR and VR — and how the line between the two technologies is increasingly becoming blurred.
articles.title: What Is the Difference Between AR and VR?

articles.description: Social recovery is emerging as a user-friendly solution to keep crypto users’ holdings safe should they lose their precious seed phrase.

articles.description: The All Party Parliamentary Group for Crypto and Digital Assets Group has called for urgent regulation of the crypto industry in the UK.

articles.description: UVL Studio’s flagship project Axis Mundi is rolling out the first component of its Bandersnatch-esque NFT narrative game.
articles.title: Gamified Storytelling Project Axis Mundi Launches 72-Hour NFT Open Mint

articles.author: Ryan Gladwin
articles.description: After denying his bail request, the Montenegro High Court has granted Kwon police-enforced house arrest until his court date on June 16.
articles.title: Do Kwon's Bail Approved After Property Verified to Be 'Worth Millions'

articles.description: Decrypt contributor Ryan S. Gladwin shares an inside look at The Machines Arena, an upcoming top-down 4v4 shooter from Directive Games that will offer NFTs minted on Ethereum sidechain network Ronin.
articles.title: The Machines Arena Game Preview: Is This the Next Overwatch?

articles.description: InfiniGods developers Damon Gura and Owen O’Donoghue share their stance on why mobile gaming is essential to Web3 adoption and general success in the video games industry.
articles.title: You 'Have' to Be on Mobile: InfiniGods Cofounders on Gaming

articles.description: Ahead of this month's Proof of Talk event in Paris on June 14 and June 15, X Ventures co-founder and the event's co-organizer Dr. Matthias Reiser said nothing's changed for those with a "long-term view" of the industry. Still, events like the collapse of Terra and FTX in 20222 have certainly damaged investors' trust in crypto.
articles.title: Crypto Chaos of 2022 'Didn't Damage Technology Underlying the Industry': X Ventures Co-Founder Matthias Reiser

articles.description: Justin Sun, Tron founder and advisor to crypto exchange Huobi, talks to Decrypt's Liam Kelly and Stacy Elliott about the impact of Hong Kong allowing residents to trade crypto, complications of restricting access based on location, and how AI will change the industry.
articles.title: Tron's Justin Sun Thinks Hong Kong Will Be a Big Fiat Onramp for Crypto

articles.description: Computer tech firm NVIDIA profited off the crypto mining industry. Now, it's looking to artificial intelligence—and its stock price is soaring.
articles.title: NVIDIA's AI Push Could Change Gaming Forever

articles.description: The InfiniGods founders share their approach to game development and offer a critique of games that call themselves "AAA."
articles.title: Why InfiniGods Laughs at 'AAA' Web3 Games

articles.description: After six years running, EthCC is back, this time in Paris from July 17 to July 20. Decrypt sat down with the brains behind one of Ethereum’s longest-running events Jerome de Tychey to get an inside look into what’s on the agenda this year, several unannounced guests, and the rollout of at least one “secret” DeFi project.
articles.title: Make it Fast, Make it Friendly: Jerome de Tychey Unpacks Key Themes at This Year's EthCC

articles.description: The Unioverse is a multimedia sci-fi franchise with plans to facilitate user-generated content. Decrypt reporter and GG producer Kate Irwin checked out the Unioverse as Reyu, an alien character, and navigated the Proving Grounds with him. In the Proving Grounds, you'll fight an array of different drone-like flying robots (some have tentacles!!) as you navigate the puzzle-like dystopian environment. Alien meets Portal, anyone?
articles.title: Unioverse Game Preview: Hands-on With the Cinematic Proving Grounds

articles.description: Jeffrey Butler started his game development career producing EverQuest. Now, he's Avalon's Chief Product Officer. Butler told Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how he wants to create a customizable world where users can create their own worlds and in-game content.
articles.title: EverQuest Producer Jeffrey Butler on How Ready Player One Led Him to Web3 Project Avalon

articles.description: Community Gaming CEO and 3XP conference organizer Chris Gonsalves believes crypto and tech could rejuvenate and reinvent the esports industry. In an interview, he tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin why he thinks esports organizations should shake up their approach.
articles.title: Esports Orgs Should Become More Like Tech Companies: Community Gaming CEO

articles.description: GG's Kate Irwin takes us on a journey inside Mirandus, the upcoming MMORPG from Gala Games.
articles.title: SNEAK PEEK: Inside Mirandus From Gala Games

articles.description: Decrypt's GG Producer Kate Irwin offers her honest take on the Illuvium private beta, which is still in development. Take a look inside the expansive fantasy world, where RPG mechanics mix with a card-based autobattler.
articles.title: SNEAK PEEK: Inside Illuvium Private Beta!

articles.description: Mojo Melee is an auto battler game that offers Polygon NFTs. Decrypt contributor Ryan S. Gladwin playtested the game in beta and offers his thoughts on the gameplay experience.
articles.title: Mojo Melee Game Preview: Hands-on With the Casual Web3 Auto Battler

articles.description: Community Gaming CEO and 3XP organizer Chris Gonsalves tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the first 3XP video game conference, which aims to bring together fans of crypto-enabled video games, influencers, game developers, blockchain firms, and gamers under one roof in Pasadena, California from June 8-9, 2023.
articles.title: How 3XP Plans to Reshape Crypto's Reputation Among Gamers

articles.description: What is Azra Games' approach to NFTs in gaming? Azra Games CEO Mark Otero shares his vision and why he believes his approach was a key reason Azra received investment from venture capital firms like Andreessen Horowitz (a16z).
articles.title: Mark Otero Shares Why a16z Invested in Azra Games' Approach to Gaming

articles.description: Spanish Film Director Miguel Faus talks with Decrypt about how he financed his movie “Calladita” with NFTs. In his view, Web3 and blockchain allow creators to get around some of the key difficulties present in the traditional movie industry, specifically finding funding.
articles.title: Funding Web3 Film Calladita With Traditional Systems 'Wasn't Working', Says Director Miguel Faus

articles.description: Film3 pioneer, Metacannes and The Squad founder, Jordan Bayne discusses the advantages that crypto offers to filmmakers, notably owning their work's IP throughout the entire creation, production, and distribution processes.
articles.title: 'Web3 Offers Something Hollywood Does Not': Film3 Pioneer, Filmmaker Jordan Bayne

articles.description: First Flights co-founder Nick Sadler sat down with Decrypt at this year's MetaCannes festival to discuss how Web3 can support independent filmmakers by leveraging its unique blockchain-powered crowdfunding platform.
articles.title: Film3 Offers 'a Whole Bunch of Independent Filmmakers' Hope, Says First Flights Co-founder Nick Sadler
